stimulusHtml: Which of the following is an example of a visual perceptual constancy?
choicesHtml: Even though the angle from which she viewed the table had changed, Elise still perceived the table as rectangular.
Mariann did not perceive an apple as red in a dark room.
Allisonâ€™s hair was perceived as bright pink.
Marcia is able to catch the basketball because of binocular cues.
